评论概述: nice material but the graphic print is plastic
评论详情: I ordered this tshirt because I really love the bear graphic tee's. The material on the shirt itself is nice. Soft and feels very comfortable. The graphic print is not of the best quality though. It's like plastic. To the point where when you wear it and move around, it makes noise. ( Thats the best way I can describe it. ) If this was more of a screen print type, I would have absolutely given it 5 stars. I'm unsure how many washings this is going to tolerate. I have washed it once but did so in inside out, in cold water, and on delicate. I would NOT advise putting it in the dryer as it may melt.
This shirt is made of a nice wicking material. It runs true to size. The graphic is a bit odd but it's fun. Almost any young guy would like it.

This shirt definitely stuck out to me. Once I saw the actual shirt in person, I knew I picked a winner. The graphics and great quality and the design itself is artistic and catches the eye instantly. It fits well on my shoulders and hangs semi-loosely around my midsection. I always wash this inside out to preserve the application and it comes out perfectly out the wash.

I ordered this shirt oversized for my husband. But, I tried it on so I’ll be stealing it most of the time. The material is lightweight, soft and so comfortable! I’m not exaggerating either. I’m gonna love wearing this around the house!
